findings.title: Deeply nested and hard to follow logic in disburseToREIDAO function
findings.description: The logic in this function is deeply nested and hard to follow.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized resuming of minting tokens after finishMinting has been called
findings.description: The contract allows minting to be stopped (finishMinting) and restarted (startMinting), which could allow a rogue owner to resume minting tokens even after all documented issuances had completed, potentially exceeding the fixed supply of 5,000,000 REI Tokens.

findings.title: Locked CRV and CRP Tokens can be transferred
findings.description: REIDAOMintableLockableToken contract does not override BasicToken.transfer or StandardToken.transferFrom, allowing users to transfer locked tokens.
